title: Until Proven Innocent 2009 REPACK DVDR R4 NTSC ANGELiCFTP
description:
David Dougherty was found guilty and jailed, accused of the abduction and rape of an eleven year old who lived in your neighborhood. It took two trials were conducted, two appeals and a petition to the governor - which amounted to three years, six months and one week in prison - so David finally managed to back his freedom and was acquitted of the crime he never committed. Only that his release would not be possible if not for the combined efforts of three people: a journalist, a lawyer and a scientist. They made efforts to put their lives, both professionally and personally at risk to prove that David did not commit the terrible crime for which he was convicted.
